summary: Desperate for money, three men (Saif Ali Khan, Fardeen Khan) plot to kidnap a woman (Sonali Bendre) and hold her for ransom.
cast: Saif Ali Khan|Fardeen Khan|Aftab Shivdasani|Sonali Bendre|Twinkle Khanna|Johnny Lever|Dalip Tahil|Sharat Saxena|Snehal Dabi|Suresh Bhagwat|Tanikella Bharani|Shubha|Shri Vallabh Vyas|Haidar Ali|Dilip Pavle|Satish Joshi|Mukesh Bhatt|Anil Upadhyay|Anupam Shyam|Master Gaurang Chaudhary|Ashwani Kumar|Eliyas Qureshi|Paresh Rawal
title: Love Ke Liye Kuch Bhi Karega
